resources.string: Готови ли сте да покажете колко добре познавате културата си?

Put your knowledge about Bulgaria to the test and battle it out with those around you! . \n Brivia gives players one chance a day to guess a random question about Bularuan culture, history and literature. After 24 hours there’s a new question of the day.\n When signing up with Google, you can view high-scores globally and locally and you can share your scores on Instagram. The faster you solve it the more points to get!
